Logo of [[Git]] [[DistributedSCM|distributed revision control system]]. 
Used by [[Gitweb]] installations to link to [http://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/docs/ git(7)], 
and by [http://git.or.cz/ Git homepage] to link to [http://git.or.cz/index.html Home].

* [http://henrik.nyh.se/2007/06/alternative-git-logo-and-favicon Alternative Git logo and favicon] at his blog: [http://henrik.nyh.se/ The Pug Automatic]

This alternative logo/favicon is used as icon for git-gui (git commit tool in Tcl/Tk).

Yet another alternate Git logo from Michael J Gruber in [http://permalink.gmane.org/gmane.comp.version-control.git/89342 Re: Git Branding Overview, Re: Git.or.cz Experimental Design] post on git mailing list.  The original is pure [[PostScript]], no fonts used.

Pseudo-3d version of Git logo, similar to the one by Henrik Nyh, found accompanying [http://maketecheasier.com/beginners-guide-to-git/2010/03/11 Beginner’s Guide to Git] blog post by [http://maketecheasier.com/author/joshuaprice/ Joshua Price] (at March 11th, 2010)
on [http://maketecheasier.com/ MakeTechEasier].
No attribution was provided for this image in the mentioned blog post.
